name: FileAttributeKey
desc: Keys in dictionaries used to get and set file attributes.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a file attribute key from a string.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a file attribute key from a raw value string.

items.name: static let appendOnly: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates whether the file is read-only.

items.name: static let busy: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates whether the file is busy.

items.name: static let creationDate: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file's creation date.

items.name: static let deviceIdentifier: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the identifier for the device on which the file resides.

items.name: static let extensionHidden: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates whether the file’s extension is hidden.

items.name: static let groupOwnerAccountID: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s group ID.

items.name: static let groupOwnerAccountName: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the group name of the file’s owner.

items.name: static let hfsCreatorCode: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s HFS creator code.

items.name: static let hfsTypeCode: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s HFS type code.

items.name: static let immutable: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates whether the file is mutable.

items.name: static let modificationDate: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s last modified date.

items.name: static let ownerAccountID: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s owner's account ID.

items.name: static let ownerAccountName: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the name of the file’s owner.

items.name: static let posixPermissions: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s Posix permissions.

items.name: static let protectionKey: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value identifies the protection level for this file.

items.name: static let referenceCount: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s reference count.

items.name: static let size: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s size in bytes.

items.name: static let systemFileNumber: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s filesystem file number.

items.name: static let systemFreeNodes: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file system attribute dictionary whose value indicates the number of free nodes in the file system.

items.name: static let systemFreeSize: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file system attribute dictionary whose value indicates the amount of free space on the file system.

items.name: static let systemNodes: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file system attribute dictionary whose value indicates the number of nodes in the file system.

items.name: static let systemNumber: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file system attribute dictionary whose value indicates the filesystem number of the file system.

items.name: static let systemSize: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file system attribute dictionary whose value indicates the size of the file system.

items.name: static let type: FileAttributeKey
items.desc: The key in a file attribute dictionary whose value indicates the file’s type.
